roles.note: I doubt the hearer arg would ever appear, but class membershippredicts it.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: If [Mr. Mason]*-1 had used less derogatory language [*-1] to articulate his amateur analysis of the voting behavior of his fellow New Yorkers, would the water be quite so hot?
example.arg: his amateur analysis of the voting behavior of his fellow New Yorkers

predicate.note: Frames file for 'articulate' based on sentences in wsj.
